description:
Want to Take Photos Like a Pro with your Nikon D3000? The Answer Will Now Be in on your TouchPad.
 
With TouchPad Camera Guides from QuickPro, you'll never have to miss the shot of your life again. Whether it’s that birthday surprise, graduation ceremony, or your daughters' wedding day, the ability to take a photo like a Pro is within reach.  It's literally in your pocket. 
 
QuickPro Camera Guides, the leading producer of Camera Guide tutorials, announces Nikon D3000 Basic. Now you have ready to go instruction of all camera functions where you need it and when you need it. Really want to capture the Colosseum and Pantheon on your trip to Rome? Take along your TouchPad and, while you're on the plane, enjoy a Pro training session with a QuickPro Camera Guide specialist.  

Provides:
- Instructional video on all aspects of the camera and photography.
- On the go video playback. No WIFI required after initial install for watching in the field.

Subjects Include:
- Camera Parts Overview
- Memory Cards & Image Storage
- Megapixels & Image Size
- Camera Setup
- Charge & Insert the Battery
- Adjust the Diopter
- Install & Format a Memeory Card
- Mount & Dismount a Lens
- Basic Picture Taking
- Basic Playback on LCD
- Guide Mode
- Adjust Camera Settings
- Navigating the Menu System
- Playback Menu Options
- Shooting Menu Options
- Setup Menu Options
- Retouch Menu Options
- Recent Settings Menu Options
- Single Frame Release Mode
- Continuous Release Mode
- Self-Timer Release Mode
- AF Auto Servo Mode
- AF Single Servo Mode
- AF Continuous Servo Mode
- MF Manual Focus Mode
- Focus Areas
- Focus Area Modes
- White Balance Overview
- White Balance Settings

This training content was produced by QuickPro, LLC. This product is not sponsored by Nikon, Corp. or its subsidiaries. Nikon Product Names and terminology are trademarks of Nikon, Corp.
